long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ObsidianMark enhances your web research and note-taking by bridging the gap between web browsing and your Obsidian vault. With a single click, capture web content as Markdown notes, complete with metadata.

Key features:
- Clip selected text or entire pages
- Auto-convert to Markdown
- Include metadata (title, author, URL, date)
- Customize vault, folder, and tags
- Works with Obsidian's advanced URI scheme

Perfect for researchers, writers, and knowledge workers who use Obsidian for organizing information. ObsidianMark streamlines your workflow, making it easier than ever to collect and reference web content in your personal knowledge base.

Note: Requires Obsidian to be installed on your device with the Advanced URI plugin enabled in your vault.
